content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for considering my apartment. I understand that you are interested in renting the space for your stay in Mannheim. May I ask what your budget is for the monthly rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 800-900 Euros. I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Thank you for sharing your budget, Maria. Based on the size of the apartment and the current market rates in Mannheim, I would recommend a rental price of 950 Euros per month. This price takes into account the cost of utilities and other expenses that you may incur during your stay.

I understand that as a student, you may be looking for a more affordable option. However, I assure you that this price is fair and reflects the value of the apartment and the location. If you have any questions or concerns, please let me know.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand the price you propose. However, I am looking for a lower price. Is there any room for negotiation?

Also, I want to be on good terms with my landlord. Can you assure me that I can always pay the rent on time?

Lastly, can I see the contract before signing it?

Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Thank you for your response, Maria. I understand that you are looking for a lower rental price. However, based on the size of the apartment and the current market rates in Mannheim, I am unable to lower the price any further.

I assure you that as a landlord, I am committed to ensuring that you always pay the rent on time. I will provide you with a clear payment schedule and reminders to help you stay on track.

Regarding the contract, I can provide you with a copy once we have reached an agreement on the rental price. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about the contract.

I appreciate your interest in the apartment and I hope that we can come to an agreement that works for both of us. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine
